Name: Binary: A Puzzling Platformer
About the game: Binary is a game that requires players to mix the ability to solve puzzles and effectively platform. It is about Bit, a piece of computer data, trying to find his fellow bits who got lost in a data transfer. Features Emphasis on platforming and puzzle gameplay. Artwork in a unique blend of vector graphics and pixel art that captures the feeling of a digital world. 6 levels, each with unique features including mouse-movable platforms, ferocious viruses (no, they will not infect your computer), player-changing processors, and more! Original Soundtrack with distinct personalities and feelings.
